short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WatchOnPlex enhances Google searches, seamlessly integrating Plex streaming for quick access to favorite movies and TV shows.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WatchOnPlex is a Chrome extension designed to enhance your online streaming experience by seamlessly integrating with your Plex media server. With a user-friendly interface, WatchOnPlex allows you to effortlessly check the availability of movies and TV shows on Plex directly from Google search results. Simply input your Plex details, and WatchOnPlex will intelligently display Plex as one of the streaming options in the search results, providing quick access to your media library.
